original_text: The man went towards the east. He measured 500 metres in that direction. He took me through the water there. The water was as high as my ankles.
korean_text: 그 사람이 손에 줄을 잡고 동쪽으로 나아가며 천 척을 측량한 후에 내게 그 물을 건너게 하시니 물이 발목에 오르더니

sentences.original_text: The man went towards the east.
He took me through the water there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳의 물을 통해 저를 데려갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: The water was as high as my ankles.
